data.title: Stow Your Bags
data.meta_description: Stow Your Bags offers luggage storages in the most important Italian cities. Book for your locker online or on the spot, enjoy the city with no bags. Safe, affordable and fast.
data.text:
About us

Since 15 years we have been dealing with welcome and hospitality services in Italy; taking care of the stay of our guests to the finest details. The idea of Stow your bags was born from the need to offer a luggage storage facility in the most important Italian cities; so to allow tourists and travelers to safely leave their luggage and fully enjoy the beauty of our cities.
